name: @pxblue/icons-mui
description: PX Blue icons for Material UI
author: px-blue <pxblue@eaton.com>

scripts.mui:react: rm -r icons && cd mui-icon-builder && yarn && babel-node --config-file ./babel.config.js builder.js --output-dir ../icons --svg-dir ../node_modules/@pxblue/symbols && cd .. && yarn run babelfy
scripts.svgr:react: rm -r icons && npx @svgr/cli -d icons node_modules/@pxblue/symbols --template mui-template.js --expand-props none --no-dimensions && yarn run babelfy
scripts.publish:full: yarn install && yarn run mui:react && npm version patch && npm publish
